divs: sighting detailsi was driving in my car to go sing in waterloo, iowa; and was alone on the highway and it was a very beautiful day, not a cloud in the sky, just blue skys; when all at once i saw a glare in my left eye which i looked up at the sun, thinking it was glare from the sun, but when i looked to the right of the sun, i saw something odd. there was a tiny little cloud and i thought again, how odd, then as i was looking at it i saw a very shinney metal thing and then i saw it move, like a rotation movement, and when it did that the whole thing just disappeared, cloud and all, and were talking minutes\seconds, and then it was a clear blue sky again, as if nothing was there. i immedately realized that i had just seen a ufo, in the middle of the day, why?, it scared me, so i called my spouse and my sister by cell phone to tell them what had just happened in case something happened to me, it was that real!!!!!!!!!!!! thank you *(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez\cms)
Summary: Saw something very shiny off to the right of sun hiding behind a cloud. As I watched there was movement and then it all disappeared and there was nothing there at all but blue sky.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Cresco
This sighting has never been favorited.
